Westfield Newmarket security guard stabbing: Police Minister Mark Mitchell visits injured man in hospital https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/westfield-newmarket-security-guard-stabbing-police-minister-mark-mitchell-visits-injured-man-in-hospital/QSMBDZI3SNDT5GU5H23PYBLXSE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/westfield-newmarket-security-guard-stabbing-police-minister-mark-mitchell-visits-injured-man-in-hospital/QSMBDZI3SNDT5GU5H23PYBLXSE/ Cherie Howie“We shudder to think what could’ve happened if knife-wielding offender wasn’t stopped." Sat, 23 Nov 2024 01:40:59 +0000 Security guard Lopeti is pictured with visitors to his hospital bedside this morning, including Police Minister Mark Mitchell, left, Newmarket Business Association chief executive Mark Knoff-Thomas, second from right, and fellow Newmarket Security staff. Lopeti was critically injured when he was stabbed in the neck while working outside Westfield Newmarket mall in Auckland on Thursday. Photo / LinkedIn
